mapper.select: select b.boa_no, b.boa_name, u.usr_no as "userDTO.usr_no", u.usr_id as "userDTO.usr_id", u.usr_name as "userDTO.usr_name" from t_board b inner join t_user u on b.usr_no = u.usr_no where b.boa_status = 1 order by b.boa_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(boa_no, boa_name, usr_no) values(seq_board.nextval, #{boa_name}, #{userDTO.usr_no})
